title: Groom, wearing moustache, dark necktie, and light colored carnation on left lapel, standing with bride, wearing floral headpiece, earrings, necklace, light colored belted wedding dress with floral lace overlay, and light colored cropped three quarter sleeve jacket with floral lace overlay and corsage on left shoulder, gathered behind table with Mexican tablecloth and three tiered wedding cake in interior with floral wallpaper, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
